form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STREEM SCREENED BY NARA, 6/28/2023

full_text: DEPARTMENT OF STSCREENED by NARA, 6/28/2023 Budget Bureau No. 47-R121 WASHINGTON, D. C. Approval Expires Dec. 31, 1956 ORANCE BY AN INDIVIDUAL SPONSOR FOR NAMED ALIEN (For use under the Refugee Relief Act of 1953) DO NOT WRITE IN THIS SPACE Read Instructions On Page 4 Before Filling In Form I, Harold Collins Warren NAME: (First) (Middle) (Last) residing at Tougaloo College, Tougaloo, Hinds County, Mississippi (ADDRESS: Street and No., or R.F.D. No., City, County, State) sponsor the admission into the United States under the Refugee Relief Act of 1953 of: (1) Mei-Ling Yen Tuan NAME: (First) (Middle) (Last) March 16, 1901 Shantung, China Chinese (Date of Birth) (Place and Country of Birth) (Nationality) O Address 245 Sai Yee Street (3rd floor), Kowloon, Hong Kong (Camb, or Street and No., City, Province, Country) Hong Kong (Location of American Consulate at which visa application will be made) (2) Members of the family of alien listed under (1) who will accompany him: on (Name) (Date of Birth) Iar (Place and Country (Nationality) of Birth) (Relationship to (1)) ied (Gregorian) (a) Pao Shing Tuan, Feb. 25, I935, Shanghai, China, Chinese, Son we (b) Pansy Tuan, June 5, 1936, Shanghai, China, Chinese, Daughter on (c) Douglas Tuan, Feb. 21,1938, Shanghai, China, Chinese, Son d S the (d) Ben Tuan, Oct. 13,1939, Shanghai, China, Chinese, Son Ch (e) Ch (3) State your relationship, if any, to any of the aliens listed above H None (4) I assure that the alien listed under (1) will be suitably employed as stated below without dis- placing listed some other person from employment and that such alien and the members of his family as from above will not become public charges and will have housing without displacing some other person such housing. I understand that the assurance herewith given by me is my personal obligation, as provided in the Refugee Relief Act of 1953. (a) I assure that the alien listed under (1) will be employed as Relief VERIFIED under the Refugee Act of 1953. he A housewife and No. 10236 ec. 2 at (Occupation or Name of Job) Date SEP 7 - 1954 of Tougaloo College, Tougaloo, Mississippi ce b (Address of Place of Employment) For the Administrator: ted her husband Order waved d M (Name and Address of Employer) and that such employment will be furnished under the following terms and wages, any other compensations, hours, and other terms) Director, Visa Office or of (b) I further assure that such employment is of permanent indefinite available upon the arrival of the alien in the United States if such arrival takes place not nature and will be later than (Month, Day and Year) or n
